tradestock.model.strategy

Class Strategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • tradestock.model.strategy.Strategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStrategy

    public class Strategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStrategy
    This class represent a strategy. A strategy has strategy name, stock list, weight list, begin date, end date, amount and day.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Strategy(java.lang.String name)
      Construct a strategy object with given name.

      • setStocks

        public void setStocks(java.util.List<java.lang.String> stocks,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.Double> weights)
        Set stocks and weights. If stocks or weights is null or empty list, or number of stock and weight is different, or sum of weights is over 1, then this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        stocks - stock list
